name: Guardian Pillar: Abundant Shamans
description: Crowned with a metal brazier, these massive stone pillars are sparsely adorned with stepped patterns. Said to perform both illumination and ritual functions within the Stadium of the Sacred Flame, they stand as symbols of Natlan's shamans.\nThe shamans watch over the Night Kingdom's borders, all the while seeking revelations hidden beyond the veil of mystery. May all follow their guidance to find the answers they seek, and under their protection, find a path of their own...
